医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：枪伤预防政策需要正确实施才能有效密歇根大学枪械伤害研究所领导的一项新的科学政策审查表明，当极端风险保护令等基于证据的枪械伤害预防政策得到正确实施时，它们可以在预防枪支相关伤害和死亡方面发挥重要作用预防。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-Firearm-injury-prevention-policies-need-to-be-implemented-properly-to-be- effective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-Firearm-injury-prevention-policies-need-to-be-implemented-properly-to-be- effective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c2a5e1e-fa77-4646-81e6-71cf4ec68011 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 11:30:58 -0400
AHA 科学声明强调了心血管护理中共同决策的证据美国心脏协会的一份新科学声明强调了支持共同决策的证据，该术语描述了确保患者拥有与其专业医疗保健团队合作做出健康决策的知识和工具的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/AHA-scientific-statement-highlights-evidence-for-shared-decision-making-in-cardioangio-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/AHA-scientific-statement-highlights-evidence-for-shared-decision-making-in-cardioangio-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50dd8894-b47b-4c9a-9d6c-e2aa47d379b1 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 11:17:38 -0400 AHA scientific statement highlights evidence for shared decision-making in cardiovascular care
研究人员开发用于癌症检测的太赫兹成像系统通过 X 射线、CT 扫描、核磁共振成像和超声波进行的医学成像为医疗保健专业人员提供了独特的视角，并更好地了解患者体内发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Researchers-develop-terahertz-imaging-systems-for-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Researchers-develop-terahertz-imaging-systems-for-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb07c02e-20f7-4486-a558-f53ace5449fe Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:55:26 -0400 Researchers develop terahertz imaging systems for cancer detection
高龄产妇增加了日本孕产妇死亡的风险研究人员调查了日本高龄产妇与孕产妇死亡率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Advanced-maternal-age-increases-the-risk-of-maternal-mortality-in-Japan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Advanced-maternal-age-increases-the-risk-of-maternal-mortality-in-Japan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c12d90c-abae-4940-84d9-f0dd7f58358e Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:55:00 -0400 Advanced maternal age increases the risk of maternal mortality in Japan
透明水晶胸腔用于肺功能实时成像研究人员开发了“水晶胸腔”，这是一种透明的胸腔，用于以细胞分辨率进行实时肺部成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Transparent-crystal-ribcage-for-real-time-imaging-of-lung-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Transparent-crystal-ribcage-for-real-time-imaging-of-lung-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee97be76-83bc-416b-b25c-628868d06573 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:51:00 -0400 Transparent crystal ribcage for real-time imaging of lung function
晚年抑郁症：以老龄化新视角弥合差距研究人员探索晚年抑郁症与衰老之间的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Late-life-depression-Bridging-the-gap-with-new-perspectives-on-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Late-life-depression-Bridging-the-gap-with-new-perspectives-on-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0ac14dd-070b-4241-b82e-6ad7f9222999 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:44:00 -0400 Late life depression: Bridging the gap with new perspectives on aging
轻度 SARS-CoV-2 感染后的嗅觉功能障碍与结构连接的神经系统变化相关研究人员调查了轻度 SARS-CoV-2 后出现嗅觉功能障碍的患者嗅球体积和大脑结构连接的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Olfactory-dysfunction-following-mild-SARS-CoV-2-infection-linked-with-neurological-changes-in-structural-connectivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Olfactory-dysfunction-following-mild-SARS-CoV-2-infection-linked-with-neurological-changes-in-structural-connectivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0c886da-9242-480b-ada3-7e834217da9c Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:28:00 -0400 Olfactory dysfunction following mild SARS-CoV-2 infection associated with neurological changes in structural connectivity
自身细胞外核酸在神经炎症中的作用研究人员探索自身细胞外核酸在中风、多发性硬化症、阿尔茨海默病和帕金森病等疾病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/The-role-of-self-extracellular-nucleic-acids-in-neuroinflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/The-role-of-self-extracellular-nucleic-acids-in-neuroinflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5963dc9c-5e87-440e-8fea-abc15a6416a7 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:23:00 -0400 The role of self-extracellular nucleic acids in neuroinflammation
“时间范围”是评估糖尿病患者认知功能的首选血糖指标吗？研究人员检查了 2 型糖尿病患者的时间范围、血糖指标和认知障碍之间的关联https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Is-time-in-range-the-preferred-glycemicc2a0metric-to-evaluate-cognitive-fuction-in-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Is-time-in-range-the-preferred-glycemicc2a0metric-to-evaluate-cognitive-fuction-in-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee0752b4-9b56-4a78-9908-eb7749abb6a1 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:16:00 -0400 Is 'time in range' the preferred glycemic metric to evaluate cognitive fuction in diabetics?
既往感染和疫苗接种对 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 感染的保护作用研究人员估计了混合免疫对 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 变种感染的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/The-protective-effect-of-previous-infections-and-vaccinations-on-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/The-protective-effect-of-previous-infections-and-vaccinations-on-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9841b73-df58-4e62-a05f-d76ed69b9a70 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 10:13:00 -0400 The protective effect of previous infections and vaccinations on SARS-CoV-2 Omicron infection
